document_data.mainbody:
lawful evil
Krikendolt was an unusual barbazu in Avernus, first layer of the Nine Hells, in the late 15 century DR.
During one of the many battles of the Blood War, a vrock hit Krikendolts head, causing him a brain injury that unknown to everyone switched his alignment to chaotic good.
In the , Zariel ordered Krikendolt and four of his fellows to burn Avernus trees before they grew into thickets and blossomed with abyssal chicken. However, Krikendolt pitied the chickens and when his companions found about this, they started to pressure him to kill the chickens or face death.
